Chris Vanderloo

Computer Science & Cognitive Science student at Rensselaer Polytechnic

About Me

 

I'm currently a student at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute currently working towards a dual B.S. in Computer Science & Cognitive Science. I enjoy skiing, I'm a huge Apple fan, and I've been programming since around 4th grade.

Portfolio

I try to keep myself busy.

Here's some of the projects I've been working on.

Schedj

An iOS/Android app to bring RPI's Student Information System to mobile platforms, powered by React Native and Node.js.

Links: schedj-frontend schedj-backend

2048 AI

A console-based implementation of the popular game 2048 with a baked-in expectimax AI.

Links: 2048-expectimax
